org.apache.giraph.master

类 MasterCompute

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.master.MasterCompute
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AggregatorUsage, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable, MasterAggregatorUsage, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    直接已知子类:
    DefaultMasterCompute

    public abstract class MasterCompute
extends Object
implements MasterAggregatorUsage, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable
    Interface for defining a master vertex that can perform centralized computation between supersteps. This class will be instantiated on the master node and will run every superstep before the workers do. Communication with the workers should be performed via aggregators. The values of the aggregators are broadcast to the workers before vertex.compute() is called and collected by the master before master.compute() is called. This means aggregator values used by the workers are consistent with aggregator values from the master from the same superstep and aggregator used by the master are consistent with aggregator values from the workers from the previous superstep. Note that the master has to register its own aggregators (it does not call WorkerContext functions), but it uses all aggregators by default, so useAggregator does not have to be called.

    • 构造器概要

      • registerAggregator

        public final <A extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> boolean registerAggregator(String name,
                                                                   Class<? extends Aggregator<A>> aggregatorClass)
                                 throws InstantiationException,
                                        IllegalAccessException
        从接口复制的说明: MasterAggregatorUsage
        Register an aggregator in preSuperstep() and/or preApplication(). This aggregator will have its value reset at the end of each super step.
        指定者:
        registerAggregator 在接口中 MasterAggregatorUsage
        类型参数:
        A - Aggregator type
        参数:
        name - of aggregator
        aggregatorClass - Class type of the aggregator
        返回:
        True iff aggregator wasn't already registered
        抛出:
        InstantiationException
        IllegalAccessException
